div.p: Baldwin Park have a website that allow the Latino immigrants in the community to be more involved with the community that they lived in. In connection to the course there are not many Latinos who are well involved in their communities because they are not seen as part of their community because they are not wanted in the town. The Latino immigrant community may not speak the English language but they do enjoy being part of the community, so there are websites in the community that allow the Chicano community to become a part of the suburb.

note.placeName: Carlos Aviles, Welcome to Baldwin Park Patch Latino
note.p: The website allows the Chicano community to be a part of the suburb without feeling left out from the community.

listBibl.bibl: Aviles, Carlos. Welcome to Baldwin Park Patch Latino. Photograph. Baldwin Park, CA.

figure.note: Carlos Aviles, 11 Dec. 2011, Cortesy of Carlos Aviles, http://patch.com/california/baldwinpark/welcome-video-english-version
